SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface Client

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientImpl, ClientSkeleton
public interface Client extends Remote
This interface provides a general presentation of the client's methods that are implemented in the ClientImpl. The methods allow the server to update the client's model view and to ping the client, also allows the client to receive client's exceptions.
See Also:
  • ClientImpl

  • Method Details

    • updateModelView

      void updateModelView(GameView modelUpdated) throws RemoteException
      This method permits to convey the updated model view.
      Parameters:
      modelUpdated - contains the model updates.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - is called when a communication error occurs and the modelView can't be sent.
      See Also:
      • View

    • ping

      void ping() throws RemoteException
      Allows to ping the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - signals the occurrence of a communication error with the client.
      See Also:
      • Client

    • receiveException

      void receiveException(GenericException exception) throws RemoteException
      Used to receive a generic exception in order to handle it.
      Parameters:
      exception - the GENERIC except being received.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called when a communication error with the client occurs.
      See Also:
      • Client

    • setAreThereStoredGamesForPlayer

      void setAreThereStoredGamesForPlayer(boolean result) throws RemoteException
      Setter used to provide knowledge on the stored game's for the player reconnecting to the current's game server.
      Parameters:
      result - true if and only if the game has been stored properly, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if connection error occurs
      See Also:
      • Game
